data.actual_result: The clicked entry first expands under the entry next to it and then all entries get pushed.
data.expected_result: Like on desktop, all the entries below the one you clicked get pushed down and then the entry expands.
data.short_description: Long entries when expanded overlap the entries below them for a split second when expanded.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Audit log of any server. - Click on a (preferably long) expandable entry. [Keep on doing this again and again (expand and collapse) with almost no intervals to observe the bug most clearly].
